metadata.title: CVE-2024-43903 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add NULL check for 'afb' before dereferencing inamdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_updateThis commit adds a null check for the 'afb' variable in theamdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_update function. Previously, 'afb' wasassumed to be null, but was used later in the code without a null check.This could potentially lead to a null pointer dereference.Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/amdgpu_dm/amdgpu_dm_plane.c:1298amdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_update() error: we previously assumed 'afb'could be null (see line 1252)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
